document_title: Mastitis: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: viem-tuyen-vu.json_3_Factors that increase the risk of mastitis
subsection_content: Have had mastitis before while breastfeeding.; Sore or cracked nipples – mastitis can even develop without a crack in the nipple or skin [4].; Wearing a tight bra or putting pressure on your breasts when using a seat belt (in a car) or when carrying a heavy bag, can restrict milk flow.; Improper care techniques; Too stressed or tired; Poor nutrition.; Smoke.
subsection_title: viem tuyen vu.json. Factors that increase the risk of mastitis
subsection_data:
viem tuyen vu.json. Factors that increase the risk of mastitis
Have had mastitis before while breastfeeding.; Sore or cracked nipples – mastitis can even develop without a crack in the nipple or skin [4].; Wearing a tight bra or putting pressure on your breasts when using a seat belt (in a car) or when carrying a heavy bag, can restrict milk flow.; Improper care techniques; Too stressed or tired; Poor nutrition.; Smoke.
